title: Google\Cloud\Core\Timestamp
name: Timestamp
description:
Represents a Timestamp value.

Nanosecond precision is preserved by passing nanoseconds as a separate argument to the constructor. If nanoseconds are given, any subsecond precision in the timestamp will be overridden when encoding the timestamp as a string.

params.name: nanoSeconds
params.description: The number of nanoseconds in the timestamp.

methods.name: get
methods.description:
Get the underlying \DateTimeInterface implementation.

Please note that nanosecond precision is not present in this method.

methods.name: formatAsString
methods.description:
Format the value as a string.

This method retains nanosecond precision, if available.
